sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"烘，烤"之意。
means: bake ： 指在烤炉里，烘烤，不与火直接接触，用持续的干热，缓慢地烘烤任何食物。
roast ： 一般指在火上烤大块的肉或整只牲畜或家禽。
toast ： 侧重通过烘烤使烘烤之物变成褐色，尤指烘面包、熏肉等。

word_mean: 烘、烤、焙：在低湿度下暴露于高温，如在瓷器硬化中

sentence.Network_en: Bake some big red peppers and hollow them out.
sentence.Network_cn: 将几个大红甜椒烤一烤，再把它们掏空。

sentence.Network_en: Pour the mixture into the cake tin and bake for 45 minutes.
sentence.Network_cn: 把混合物倒进烤模烤制45分钟。

sentence.Network_en: I've put some sesame crackers in the oven to bake.
sentence.Network_cn: 我已经把几片芝麻脆饼放进烤箱里烤了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念英语单词大全_百度文库 ... baggage n. 行李 bake vt. 烤 balcony n. 阳台.
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... baggage n. 行李 bake v. 烤； 烘（面包） bakery n. 面包店.
大学英语四、六级单词、词组 - 豆丁网 ... baggage n. 行李 bake vt. 烘烤；烧硬，焙干 balance n. 均衡；收付平衡 v.(使)保持平衡.
Zbrush使用基础介绍_Zbrush教程_朱峰社区3D教程 ... mrg: 向下合并 bake: 烘培 b blend: 烘培混合量.

list.abs: 4、泡打粉(baking powder)：是一种复合蓬松剂，有很多不同的种类。一般是将固体的碱和酸的粉末混合，在干燥的条件下它们不接触，也不.
(阴影)shading星状不平comet star pineple 保护不良break line failure 金属颗粒metallic seeding返粘after tack未烘干透under baking锉刀纹grinding scratch桔皮orange.
活化寿命skinning 结皮性 polyester putty 聚酯腻子bake schedule 干燥时间 water.
4：苏打粉(Baking soda)1/6茶匙（可以不放），水8杯；注：1大匙=15毫升=1 Tablespoon，1茶匙=5毫升=1 Teaspoon，1杯=240毫升。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bacan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch bakken and German backen

entry.def: If you bake, you spend some time preparing and mixing together ingredients to make bread, cakes, pies, or other food which is cooked in the oven.

example.ex: How did you learn to bake cakes?...

entry.def: When a cake or bread bakes or when you bake it, it cooks in the oven without any extra liquid or fat.

example.ex: Bake the cake for 35 to 50 minutes...
The batter rises as it bakes.
example.tran: 烘烤的时候，面糊会膨胀起来。

entry.def: If places or people become extremely hot because the sun is shining very strongly, you can say that they bake .

example.ex: If you closed the windows you baked...
example.tran: 如果把窗户关上，你会热死的。

example.ex: Britain bakes in a Mediterranean heatwave.
example.tran: 地中海的热浪炙烤着英国。

entry.tran: （蔬菜或鱼与其他配料切碎拌和后经烘烤的）烤菜
entry.def: A vegetable or fish bake is a dish that is made by chopping up and mixing together a number of ingredients and cooking them in the oven so that they form a fairly dry solid mass.

means.word_mean: 1. cook and make edible by putting in a hot oven;
2. prepare with dry heat in an oven;

sentences.sentence: "The sun broils the valley in the summer"

auth_sentence.content: Remove the foil and bake for a further hour.
auth_sentence.res_content: Remove the foil and bake for a further hour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Remove the foil and bake for a further hour.

auth_sentence.content: The bake-off is open to professional and amateur cooks.
auth_sentence.res_content: The bake-off is open to professional and amateur cooks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The bake-off is open to professional and amateur cooks.

auth_sentence.content: Universities have become restaurants that bake their own bread.
auth_sentence.res_content: Universities have become restaurants that bake their own bread.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Universities have become restaurants that bake their own bread.

sentences.en: Mother bakes every Saturday.
sentences.cn: 母亲每个星期六烤面包。

sentences.en: Bakers bake in huge ovens.
sentences.cn: 面包师用大烤炉烤面包。

sentences.en: The bread will not bake if the fire is too small.
sentences.cn: 如果火太小, 面包就烤不成。

sentences.en: The cakes will bake quickly.
sentences.cn: 这些饼很快就可以烤好。

sentences.en: We are baking in the sun.
sentences.cn: 我们在晒太阳。

sentences.en: The pottery was left to bake in the hot sun.
sentences.cn: 陶器放在外面让炎热的太阳烘晒焙干。

sentences.en: The dirt road became dusty as it baked under the summer sun.
sentences.cn: 在夏天烈日的暴晒下, 泥路变得满是尘土。

sentences.en: It's baking in here!
sentences.cn: 这里真是热死人了！

sentences.en: Why shouldn't Dan eat the cake?After all, he baked it.
sentences.cn: 为什么丹不该吃蛋糕?不管怎么说还是他做的呢。

sentences.en: She baked bread in an oven.
sentences.cn: 她用烤炉烤面包。

sentences.en: We baked bread and cake in an oven.
sentences.cn: 我们在炉子里烤面包和蛋糕。

sentences.en: Mrs.Green has baked cakes, and Mr. Green has bought a small present for every little guest.
sentences.cn: 格林夫人已烤好了蛋糕, 格林先生还为每个小客人各买了一个小礼物。

sentences.en: He knows how to bake bricks.
sentences.cn: 他会烧砖。

sentences.en: They settled themselves with their backs to the cliff and let the warm sun bake them through.
sentences.cn: 他们靠着岩石坐了下来, 沐浴着温暖的阳光。

sentences.en: Were these bricks baked by the sun or fire?
sentences.cn: 这些砖是太阳晒干的还是由火焙制的?

sentences.en: He baked us a cake.
sentences.cn: 他为我们烤了一块蛋糕。

sentences.en: We baked him some bread.
sentences.cn: 我们为他烤了一些面包。

sentences.en: Carol, did you bake the cake for Jim's party?
sentences.cn: 卡罗尔, 你为吉姆办的聚会烤饼了吗?

sentences.en: Don't bake the cakes black.
sentences.cn: 别把饼烤焦了。

sentences.en: The sun is baking the ground dry.
sentences.cn: 太阳烤得大地干裂。

jushi.chinese: 面包师用大烤炉烤面包。

jushi.english: We are baking in the sun.
The bread will not bake if the fire is too small.
jushi.chinese: 如果火太小,面包就烘不成。
